projects.title: Audio to Text, and Translate
projects.description:
How to use it:

1) Click Record / Stop to start and stop your recording. Speak while recording
2) Click Record / Stop again to end the recording
3) Click Play / Stop to listen to your recording
4) Click Play / Stop again to stop playback
5) Click Save to save your recording
6) Click Transcription to generate a transcript of your recording
7) Enter the target language you want to translate to, then click Translate.

projects.title: AI Job Interview Practice Tool
projects.description:
How to use it:

1. Type Company and Role
2. Click each button to generate behavioral questions and technical / hypothetical questions to practice
3. Click answer guide button to review
